mapper.insert: insert into unit_info(unitid, name, person, phone, address, type, userid) values(#{unitid}, #{name}, #{person}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{type}, #{userid})
mapper.select:
select ifNull(unitid, '-') as unitid, ifNull(name, '-') as name, ifNull(person, '-') as person, ifNull(phone, '-') as phone, ifNull(address, '-') as address, ifNull(type, '-') as type from unit_info where userid = #{userid}
and unitid like CONCAT('%', #{unitid}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and person like CONCAT('%', #{person}, '%')
and phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
and address like CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
and type like CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
